question: Will Vice President Harris cast 17 or more tie-breaking votes in 2021?
description:
This is a market on whether Kamala Harris will cast 17 or more tie-breaking votes in 2021. 

The market will resolve to “Yes” if Kamala Harris casts 17 or more tie-breaking votes in 2021, and “No” otherwise. 

Tie-breaking votes will be considered if they are cast on or before 11:59 PM ET, December 31, 2021. 

The resolution source will be https://www.senate.gov/legislative/TieVotes.htm. 

If the link changes or becomes unavailable, or is not updated with the most recent tie-breaking votes cast by the resolution time, another credible source will be chosen.

question: NBA: Will the Pacers beat the Mavericks by more than 1.5 points in their December 10 matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for December 10:

If the Indiana Pacers win by over 1.5 points, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Dallas Mavericks lose by less than 1.5 points or win, the market will resolve “No.” 

If the game is not completed by December 17, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: NBA: Will the sum of points in Hawks v. Nets be an even or an odd number?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game between Atlanta Hawks and Brooklyn Nets, scheduled for December 10:

If the total sum of points scored is an even number (ie. score is 120-118, 97-133, 115-113...), this market will resolve to “Even”.

If the total sum of points scored is an odd number (ie. score is 120-119, 97-132, 114-115...), this market will resolve to “Odd”.

If the game is not completed by December 17, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.
